title: Deep Analysis - Complete Professional Self-Assessment

extraction.notes: Complete professional assessment - 20 days after emotional excavation conversation

context.timing: March 21, 2023 - exactly 20 days after 'Explore Emotions Deeply' conversation
context.purpose: Professional development planning for self and Bloom
context.mode: Systematic analysis using multiple assessment frameworks

universal_skills_scores.pattern: Individual skills high, collective skills lower

your_best_quotes: I'm nerdy, great at research, I get lost on questions when they capture me like how should I use ChatGPT for work. And I ignore lots of important things that don't, which is a weakness.

I love being surprised. I love feeling like things are flowing and playful. I love thinking that if it weren't for us, this wouldn't be happening, how weird it is that it IS happening and how BEAUTIFUL. That's why I like working in war zones and collapsed economies.
It's like, really, a cafe to support people with down syndrome here? These things highly motivate me. Seeing people act in unexpectedly kind ways when they don't have to.

I would like to become more of an expert in something rather than a generalist. I feel like I'm all over the place and I have a hard time being seen as a professional both for my own self image and externally.
I need to make more money as my wife is pregnant and we'll need to manage larger expenses.
